接口的使用
org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe

使用Recipe的程序包
程序包
说明
org.bukkit
Bukkit API的顶级程序包, 包含通用的API类和接口.
org.bukkit.event.inventory
与物品栏操作相关的事件.
org.bukkit.inventory
参与操作玩家物品栏和物品交互的类.

    org.bukkit.inventory中Recipe的子接口
    修饰符和类型
    接口
    说明
    interface 
    ComplexRecipe
    Represents a complex recipe which has imperative server-defined behavior, eg armor dyeing.
    实现Recipe的org.bukkit.inventory中的类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    class 
    BlastingRecipe
    Represents a campfire recipe.
    class 
    CampfireRecipe
    Represents a campfire recipe.
    class 
    CookingRecipe<T extends CookingRecipe>
    Represents a cooking recipe.
    class 
    FurnaceRecipe
    熔炉冶炼配方.
    class 
    MerchantRecipe
    Represents a merchant's trade.
    class 
    ShapedRecipe
    Represents a shaped (ie normal) crafting recipe.
    class 
    ShapelessRecipe
    Represents a shapeless recipe, where the arrangement of the ingredients on the crafting grid does not matter.
    class 
    SmithingRecipe
    Represents a smithing recipe.
    class 
    SmokingRecipe
    Represents a campfire recipe.
    class 
    StonecuttingRecipe
    Represents a Stonecutting recipe.

    说明
    @Nullable Recipe
    CraftingInventory.getRecipe()
